info.name: HUJI Moodle Dark Theme
info.description:
A dark theme for the Moodle system of The Hebrew University of Jerusalem.
Might work on other sites with urls starting with "https://moodle" but i'm not sure ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Based on the theme "Moodle Dark" by the user "abhishekchakraborty".
info.additionalInfo:
This is a shitty theme. i'm not a designer and i've never used css.
feel free to suggest changes or just copy my code and upload a better version.

The additions i’ve made to abhishekchakraborty‘s code are between the comment lables:
“/** huji addition **/” and “/**end huji addition **/”
